articles.description: Reaction to the opening Premier League weekend as defending champions Manchester Citye, plus latest transfer news and build-up to Tottenham's trip to Leicester.
articles.title: Latest: Man City open PL title defence with win over Chelsea + weekend reaction

articles.description: Track cyclist Matt Richardson, who won three medals for Australia at the Paris Olympics, switches nationality and will now represent Great Britain.
articles.title: Matt Richardson: Australian Olympian joins Great Britain cycling team

articles.description: The inevitable problems of Chelsea's bloated squad start even before the season kicks off with Raheem Sterling accused of letting his team-mates down by a pundit.
articles.title: Raheem Sterling statement shows size of Enzo Maresca's task at Chelsea

articles.description: After four years of The Hundred, outside investment is coming and the tournament could look very different come 2025.
articles.title: The Hundred: What is next for tournament with big changes expected?

articles.description: MOTD2 pundit Danny Murphy explains why Mateo Kovacic made the difference as holding midfielder in Manchester City's win over Chelsea.
articles.title: No Rodri, no problem - why Kovacic was the 'epitome of experience' for Man City v Chelsea

articles.description: Brooks Koepka beats Jon Rahm in a play-off at the Greenbrier Invitational to win his fifth LIV Golf title and his second of the year.
articles.title: LIV Golf Greenbrier: Brooks Koepka beats Jon Rahm in a play-off to win fifth LIV Golf title

articles.description: Mike Tyson says he is over the issues that forced his fight with Jake Paul to be postponed.
articles.title: Mike Tyson 'ready' for rescheduled Jake Paul fight

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats as Mallorca take on Real Madrid in La Liga.
articles.title: La Liga LIVE: Mallorca vs Real Madrid - score & text updates

articles.description: Brentford boss Thomas Frank says Ivan Toney's departure from the club is "not close", despite choosing to leave the striker out of his squad for their Premier League opener because of transfer speculation.
articles.title: Ivan Toney departure 'not close' despite absence from Brentford squad

articles.description: World number one Jannik Sinner overcomes Alexander Zverev in a three-set thriller to reach the final of the Cincinnati Open.
articles.title: Cincinnati Open: Jannik Sinner beats Alexander Zverev in three-set thriller to reach final
